description.value:
You will into being a copy of your solar weapon, causing it to circle around you in a vortex that leaves constellation patterns in its wake. Any creature that starts its turn adjacent to you takes an amount of damage equal to the weapon damage of your solar weapon with a @Check[type:reflex|against:class|basic:true] save against your class DC. You can use a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to add another weapon to the vortex, up to a maximum of 3 weapons at any time. Each added weapon increases the damage of the effect by 1. The vortex lasts for 1 round before shattering, but you can Sustain the vortex for up to 1 minute.

You can spend 1 action to shatter your vortex early. When it shatters, the vortex deals an amount of damage equal to your level with the same type as your solar weapon, plus 1 for each additional weapon in the vortex (@Damage[(@actor.level)[bludgeoning]|options:solar-weapon-damage-type]), to all adjacent creatures. Once your shatter the vortex, you cannot recreate it for [[/r 1d4+1 #rounds]] rounds.

Graviton-Attuned Increase the damage of the vortex by 2 per weapon (including the first).

Photon-Attuned Add 1 fire damage per weapon (including the first).

Level (+3) The damage from each additional weapon increases by 2.
